resources.string: Switch the internal and the external sdcard on your device. Use at your own risk (even if...) You can use the app with almost every devices. Carefully locate the external and internal folder and your external sdcard device and update the settings (it will spread rainbow pony all over the world).
* it will stay until you reboot the phone
** At boot, the application will execute the copy, no init.d support required!\n

Application by codlab ( @codlab or http://twitter.com/codlab).
 Source code available on github : http://github.com/codlab/android_internal_external /
 Check my application on the market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=codlab
 Original script by mattiadj from xda.
 Original thread :http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1772234
Le device de la carte sd externe
The access to the original ext. block
mount -o option for the device (often umask=0000 is enough, set to it if problems)
It seems you did not choose a configuretion. Press ok to open the settings
Le fichier a été sauvegardé dans data/codlab_int2ext
Sent when the swap is done
The mount result was incorrect. Error with su?
The list will be send to codlab/codlabtech@gmail.com
the build.prop will be used to target the conf
Click here to see all the different devices and fs
You can\'t uncheck a rom configuration!
Warning : you changed the settings, you have to refresh the External > Internal, boot etc...
You can contribute to this app by making a simple play-store in app donation
